5#ifndef V8_OBJECTS_DEPENDENT_CODE_H_
6#define V8_OBJECTS_DEPENDENT_CODE_H_
7
8#include "src/objects/fixed-array.h"
9
10// Has to be the last include (doesn't have include guards):
11#include "src/objects/object-macros.h"
12#include "src/roots/roots.h"
13
14namespace v8 {
15namespace internal {
16
17// Dependent code is conceptually the list of {Code, DependencyGroup} tuples
18// associated with an object, where the dependency group is a reason that could
19// lead to a deopt of the corresponding code.
20//
21// Implementation details: DependentCode is a weak array list containing
22// entries, where each entry consists of a (weak) Code object and the
23// DependencyGroups bitset as a Smi.
24//
25// Note the underlying weak array list currently never shrinks physically (the
26// contents may shrink).
27// TODO(jgruber): Consider adding physical shrinking.
28class DependentCode : public WeakArrayList {
29 public:
30 DECL_CAST(DependentCode)
31
32 enum DependencyGroup {
33 // Group of code objects that embed a transition to this map, and depend on
34 // being deoptimized when the transition is replaced by a new version.
35 kTransitionGroup = 1 << 0,
36 // Group of code objects that omit run-time prototype checks for prototypes
37 // described by this map. The group is deoptimized whenever the following
38 // conditions hold, possibly invalidating the assumptions embedded in the
39 // code:
40 // a) A fast-mode object described by this map changes shape (and
41 // transitions to a new map), or
42 // b) A dictionary-mode prototype described by this map changes shape, the
43 // const-ness of one of its properties changes, or its [[Prototype]]
44 // changes (only the latter causes a transition).
45 kPrototypeCheckGroup = 1 << 1,
46 // Group of code objects that depends on global property values in property
47 // cells not being changed.
48 kPropertyCellChangedGroup = 1 << 2,
49 // Group of code objects that omit run-time checks for field(s) introduced
50 // by this map, i.e. for the field type.
51 kFieldTypeGroup = 1 << 3,
52 kFieldConstGroup = 1 << 4,
53 kFieldRepresentationGroup = 1 << 5,
54 // Group of code objects that omit run-time type checks for initial maps of
55 // constructors.
56 kInitialMapChangedGroup = 1 << 6,
57 // Group of code objects that depends on tenuring information in
58 // AllocationSites not being changed.
59 kAllocationSiteTenuringChangedGroup = 1 << 7,
60 // Group of code objects that depends on element transition information in
61 // AllocationSites not being changed.
62 kAllocationSiteTransitionChangedGroup = 1 << 8,
63 // Group of code objects that depends on a const-tracked let variable in
64 // a ScriptContext not being changed.
65 kConstTrackingLetChangedGroup = 1 << 9,
66 // IMPORTANT: The last bit must fit into a Smi, i.e. into 31 bits.
67 };
68 using DependencyGroups = base::Flags<DependencyGroup, uint32_t>;
69
70 static const char* DependencyGroupName(DependencyGroup group);
71
72 // Register a dependency of {code} on {object}, of the kinds given by
73 // {groups}.
74 V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE static void InstallDependency(Isolate* isolate,
75 Handle<Code> code,
76 Handle<HeapObject> object,
77 DependencyGroups groups);
78
79 template <typename ObjectT>
80 static void DeoptimizeDependencyGroups(Isolate* isolate, ObjectT object,
81 DependencyGroups groups);
82
83 template <typename ObjectT>
84 static void DeoptimizeDependencyGroups(Isolate* isolate,
85 Tagged<ObjectT> object,
86 DependencyGroups groups);
87
88 template <typename ObjectT>
89 static bool MarkCodeForDeoptimization(Isolate* isolate,
90 Tagged<ObjectT> object,
91 DependencyGroups groups);
92
93 V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE static Tagged<DependentCode> empty_dependent_code(
94 const ReadOnlyRoots& roots);
95 static constexpr RootIndex kEmptyDependentCode =
96 RootIndex::kEmptyWeakArrayList;
97
98 // Constants exposed for tests.
99 static constexpr int kSlotsPerEntry =
100 2; // {code: weak InstructionStream, groups: Smi}.
101 static constexpr int kCodeSlotOffset = 0;
102 static constexpr int kGroupsSlotOffset = 1;
103
104 private:
105 // Get/Set {object}'s {DependentCode}.
106 static Tagged<DependentCode> GetDependentCode(Tagged<HeapObject> object);
107 static void SetDependentCode(Handle<HeapObject> object,
108 Handle<DependentCode> dep);
109
110 static Handle<DependentCode> InsertWeakCode(Isolate* isolate,
111 Handle<DependentCode> entries,
112 DependencyGroups groups,
113 Handle<Code> code);
114
115 bool MarkCodeForDeoptimization(Isolate* isolate,
116 DependencyGroups deopt_groups);
117
118 void DeoptimizeDependencyGroups(Isolate* isolate, DependencyGroups groups);
119
120 // The callback is called for all non-cleared entries, and should return true
121 // iff the current entry should be cleared. The Function template argument
122 // must be of type: bool (Tagged<Code>, DependencyGroups).
123 template <typename Function>
124 void IterateAndCompact(IsolateForSandbox isolate, const Function& fn);
125
126 // Fills the given entry with the last non-cleared entry in this list, and
127 // returns the new length after the last non-cleared entry has been moved.
128 int FillEntryFromBack(int index, int length);
129
130 static constexpr int LengthFor(int number_of_entries) {
131 return number_of_entries * kSlotsPerEntry;
132 }
133
134 OBJECT_CONSTRUCTORS(DependentCode, WeakArrayList);
135};
136
137DEFINE_OPERATORS_FOR_FLAGS(DependentCode::DependencyGroups)
138
139} // namespace internal
140} // namespace v8
141
142#include "src/objects/object-macros-undef.h"
143
144#endif // V8_OBJECTS_DEPENDENT_CODE_H_
